languages.text: "Это тоже внесете в свои отчеты, ван Калокс? Ни стыда, ни совести. Посмеете расстроить Леди Кассию, и, видят звезды, с рук я вам этого не спущу".
"Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."
languages.original_text: "Это тоже внесете в свои отчеты, ван Калокс? Ни стыда, ни совести. Посмеете расстроить Леди Кассию, и, видят звезды, с рук я вам этого не спущу".

traits.locale_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."
"Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."
"Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."
"Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

languages.text: “冯·卡洛克斯，你要把这些也写进报告里吗？你可真是既无羞耻，也无良知。如果你胆敢让卡西娅女士感到不快，群星在上，我保证你会后悔的。”
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: “冯·卡洛克斯，你要把这些也写进报告里吗？你可真是既无羞耻，也无良知。如果你胆敢让卡西娅女士感到不快，群星在上，我保证你会后悔的。”

languages.text: « Et alors, van Calox ? Ça aussi, vous allez le consigner dans vos rapports ? Une preuve de plus que vous n'avez ni pudeur ni conscience. Je vous préviens, si vous contrariez dame Cassia de quelque manière que ce soit, vous le regretterez. Je le jure sur les étoiles. »
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: « Et alors, van Calox ? Ça aussi, vous allez le consigner dans vos rapports ? Une preuve de plus que vous n'avez ni pudeur ni conscience. Je vous préviens, si vous contrariez dame Cassia de quelque manière que ce soit, vous le regretterez. Je le jure sur les étoiles. »

languages.text: «¿Añadirá también eso a sus informes, van Calox? No tiene ni rastro de vergüenza ni de conciencia. Como se atreva a ofender a lady Cassia, por las estrellas que haré que se arrepienta».
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: «¿Añadirá también eso a sus informes, van Calox? No tiene ni rastro de vergüenza ni de conciencia. Como se atreva a ofender a lady Cassia, por las estrellas que haré que se arrepienta».

languages.text: 「ヴァン・カロックス、それも報告書に書くのですか？あなたには恥も良心の呵責もない。カシア様の機嫌を損ねたら、星に誓って後悔させますよ」
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴァン・カロックス、それも報告書に書くのですか？あなたには恥も良心の呵責もない。カシア様の機嫌を損ねたら、星に誓って後悔させますよ」

languages.text: "Schreibt Ihr das auch in Eure Berichte, van Calox? Ihr habt weder Schamgefühl noch ein Gewissen. Wenn Ihr es wagt, Lady Cassia zu verärgern, bei den Sternen, dann sorge ich dafür, dass Ihr das bereut."
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Schreibt Ihr das auch in Eure Berichte, van Calox? Ihr habt weder Schamgefühl noch ein Gewissen. Wenn Ihr es wagt, Lady Cassia zu verärgern, bei den Sternen, dann sorge ich dafür, dass Ihr das bereut."

languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

languages.text: "Bunu da rapor edecek misin van Calox? Gerçi sende ne vicdan var ne de utanma. Leydi Cassia'yı incitecek olursan yıldızlar şahidim olsun, pişman olursun."
languages.original_text: "Will you be putting that in your reports too, van Calox? You are without shame or conscience. If you dare upset Lady Cassia, by the stars, I will make sure you regret it."

traits.locale_text: "Bunu da rapor edecek misin van Calox? Gerçi sende ne vicdan var ne de utanma. Leydi Cassia'yı incitecek olursan yıldızlar şahidim olsun, pişman olursun."
